content: Convenient and easy to use.
Seems to be working just fine! Very handy to have! Thank you.

Its been great with helping me remember my practice throughout the day and the reminder text and count down make it streamlined. If I modify the alerts, I have to cancel and reset them or they will not work. But that's a minor issue, usually I have no problem.
I like the timer. I used to set my phone timer. I would recommend this app for students who are doing the Workbook.
Thank you!
Easy

Great reminder app! It's too bad the text that I add gets deleted once I leave that lesson. Otherwise, it's wonderful! I got over my first comment, this app has been my life line to practicing the Workbook lessons! Thank you!!
Very useful and makes doing ACIM easier

Does almost everything I need it to do. A must have to remind me of my daily lesson. Much better than writing it on paper. As far as improvements, I would like to see the timer number field be directly editable. I would like to be able to delete, edit and add alerts. When I view an alert and start the countdown timer, if I turn my phone and the screen flips, the timer stops and resets itself. Also, if you have the reminder up and then switch to the main app, the timer disappears.
It's like having the workbook in your pocket. Makes it much easier to remember
It is a good way to follow through with ACIM daily exercises. I use it daily.
It needs alot of work. The alarm would be great as a reminder but doesn't work! I'm grateful that it exists but for a paid app it really is a very very poor experince.
Purchased this Sept 2019, its now Sept 2020 and its quit working.
I felt a need for such a tool before i discovered it's existence.
It's been a great tool in keeping me on track with my daily lessons.
Thank you so much for this special support.
replyContent: Thank you for this very kind feedback Janet. We are happy you are enjoying the app.

content: This app has been a Godsend for keeping me on track and reminding me to practice my lessons. There are a couple of issues however that I hope the developer can address. First, if the timer is counting down and the orientation of the phone changes, the timer reverts back to the countdown button and you can no longer see the timer. Second, you cannot minimize the reminder screen after you've opened it. It simply disappears and does not stay in memory. That said, thank you for this app. I need it.
replyContent: Thank you for this kind review and for your feedback Rose. We will address in the next release.

content: Good app I wish it has the audio

content: It works great for me. Loving it. I did notice that there is a problem with the order of the hours in the settings. To be specific setting the time from 9am to 12md is not possible as midday is set to military time 00:00 hours and so the alarms run till midnight. and if you try to set it from 9 to 12, that doesn't work either as 12 is set before nine in the list and so the system can't set the timers either. They come out blank or better said, empty. That is the only comment. Despite that, I love it. use it daily. Love the countdown feature. Great idea! Keep it up!!!!
replyContent: Thank you for this very kind feedback Warren. We'll do our best to work on the time issue you've mentioned in a future release.

content: This app is pretty much everything I need for studying the lessons of the course. Each morning I choose the next lesson. It is nice that this feature is manual, because I have been known to miss a daily lesson on occasion :). The reminders are also nice. I have picked the "ding" notification. It is the most unobtrusive yet easy to hear. Thanks for such a well designed app.
replyContent: Thank you for this very kind feedback Richard. We are happy you are enjoying the app. The app does not do an auto-setup so as not to assume that a user wishes to move to the next lesson. Sometimes a person may wish to remain on a lesson for more than one day. So the only thing you need to do is to choose your lesson and click the on/off button.

content: We are so fortunate to have an app which makes doing the Course so much easier. Thank you for all the work that went into this!!!  ‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è

Great that this app exists and it's very useful, but it could be improved a lot, for example by allowing a notification tone other than the phone default tone. I don't know if I've received an email or am supposed to do my lesson. The only thing I can do is go through all the other apps and change their notification tones one by one where possible to differentiate as many as possible from the default phone tone used by the acim app. Also, some lessons, like lesson 27 (or is it 29?) Have 2 different time intervals (one is a certain thought once an hour and then a longer practice session 6 times a day). Would be great to be able to set 2 reminders on those days and with a different notification sound for each to let me know which one I need to do.
replyContent: Custom sounds are now available.

content: Love it,thank you.
Very rewarding!

ACIM in itself is absolutely amazing and is changing my life drastically. The app isn't what I had hoped in the sense of notifications. You can set alerts to be reminded throughout the day but you have to set the notification every day on that day to remind you throughout the day. There have been days that I've completely missed it and forgotten since I am still in the beginning and it is not quite routine to me yet. Regular notifications that remember where you are in the lessons and remind you not only throughout the day but also each day and each lesson with the set amount of notifications throughout the day would be great and help to have greater success in making it routine and not falling too far off track. Other than that I think the app is great and I am very grateful it is available. I'm sure that in time the developer will make the necessary changes so for now I will be using my calendar reminders to notify me. Big thanks to making this app available. üôè

This app is so helpful as a reminder to do the lessons and providing the text to go with the lessons so you don't have to open The Course book for them.  And the app is super easy to use and it works well on my android phone.
Super portable, and keeps me on track with the workbook exercises.  This app is a blessing!
The alerts don't work. And its not the full book, just the daily text.
replyContent: Please update to the most recent version and follow important note in Help to correct alerting issues.  Also, app has the entire "Workbook" in addition to the daily  affirmations.

content: Most expensive app I own, with very little functionality and lots of omissions of what should be pretty obvious features. Having said that, I still use it every day because doing the Course is extremely valuable to my life, and this is the only app there is for daily lessons, as far as I'm aware.
So helpful to stay focused with the lessons
Love this app! ACIM is one of the truly remarkable channellings along with L&L Reasearches "Law of One" /Ra material. Reminders aren't working so well or I'd give it 5 stars!

I am so happy and grateful for A Course in Miracles Lesson alert app and the committed and dedicated support by the app creator to work with me and my Galaxy S7 that was not cooperating with the app for the alert chimes to ring. I have realized the immense challenge an app creator must have to have their app work with possibly thousands of different variations of Android phones!  ACIM has changed my life. I am grateful to have this Lesson alert tool to assist me to deepen my commitment and practice! Thank You üòä
This is a useful app for anyone studying the course wanting reminders throughout the day and access to the text. Works well.
Great tool for keeping me on track.
Great reminder throughout day! Could use added feature to move to next lesson at midnight in my timezone; for now, I depend on MDC email for lesson number notification.
Great App. Very dependable easy to use. Great reminder capabilities.
This app is a must have for studying the book! So much fun having the lessons with me all day.
ACIM Alert Workbook
Easy to use and the reminders are great
ACIM is the best thing to come into my life and this is the most useful tool for living the Course. Love it.

I am a technically challenged individual so i did not know how to get a vibration alert. I posted on this venue for help and received an email and phone call within less than 24 hours! Amazing. Thankyou. I am on lesson 10 and already see/feel changes in my thinking
replyContent: Thank you Lizzane.

content: If you're studying the CIM, then I highly recommend your try this app. I use it for daily lessons. You can also set it to periodically remind you to review the lesson thru the day. I love having this on my phone so the workbook is always with me.
Very useful app. Exactly what I have been looking for, now I can take the lessons with me right on my phone...

This app is for those who are serious about mastering ACIM. It is highly useful tool. I would like a feature that automatically forwards to the next day, but that is not a huge deal. I would really like to have the minder and daily lesson be compatible with an andriod smart watch. I would buy a smart watch just to use this app. I hope this comes to pass soon.

The reminders are invaluable for completing  the Workbook as intended.  With this, it's too easy to forget the lesson of the day with all the worldly distractions that can consume my mind. Every thoughtfully designed app.
Easy to use but the alerts don't work. Any updates coming soon? Thank you.
replyContent: Please update to the most recent version and follow important note in Help to correct alerting issues.

content: Really enjoying this app. Would love the opportunity to highlight. I use this app for the daily lessons and my Kindle copy for reading the text... Easier to keep my place in each that way.
A Course in Miracles
Excellent app, using on Sams Galaxy Note 4
Awesome app!!! It really helps me to stay focused!!! It would be lovely if it had the lessons audibly.

Greetings. I love your app and I wanted to ask something, can arrange a possible cancellation of vibration reminders? I would like reminders will be the only ringing without vibration. Thank you, Dan Kaspa.
replyContent: Hi Dan - that's something you do via your device settings. I'm happy to walk you through how to do it. Please email me directly at cdesolutionsinc@gmail.com if you would like me to help.

content: This app is a great study companion for ACIM. I can do my lessons with more consistency now. Thanks so much!
Such a fantastic aid to The Course.
It helps bring you back to what is most important.
Works really well. Reminds me of the lesson and I am very glad I found it

The alerts will function only up to a 12 or or even  up to a 24 hour maximum length, at which point you will have to manually turn alerts back on, generally the next day or, until you realize it is not longer notifying you. Am only giving the app 1 star because it does not satisfy my needs.
replyContent: Alerts need to be setup each morning. However, it is a simple matter of choosing the lesson and clicking the set alerts button. The app defaults to Course recommended intervals. Intervals only need to specified if the user wants frequencies other than Course recommended.

content: Really useful to keep on track
Having the reminders pop up on phone is very helpful
Alerts don't work and it doesn't remember which lesson I'm on. I would like a refund!
replyContent: Please update to the most recent version and follow important note in Help to correct alerting issues.

content: I love the application especially the choice of formats of lessons and the alerts.
This is exactly what I was looking for to help me in my practice. Thank you!

The alerts took a little while to kick in, but they are functioning fine!  Great app, just wish you could set it for reminders in the future.  As it is now, I have to go in every morning  and set it for the next lesson for that day.  It's a small thing, but it would make it a 5-Star app.  Also, maybe an option to have a bell go off, or vibrate or something for a reminder.  Other wise, I'm enjoying it :)
replyContent: Hello Jeff -  there is a sound setting in the app.

content: I  love it. Works great on my phone. It's helping me stay mindful and getting into the habit. Thanks
I love the text and reminder system. Very helpful.
I highly recommend this app for anyone practicing the workbook section of A Course In miracles. It is extremely helpful!
So helpful
The easy access and reminders are so helpful. It's perfect for those that need a little guidance.

This app has really been good for me in staying with my lessons throughout the day. The reminders have me thinking about my lesson even before I hear the reminder notification. Lets face it, life gets busy and sometimes its easy to forget. I use this app every day.
I love the application idea; however, the alerts do not work and even if they wold work it does not give you the flexibility to set alerts on the evening before.
replyContent: Please update to the most recent version and follow important note in Help to correct alerting issues.

content: Love this app!
I did the course a couple of years ago and had some difficulty with scheduling the reminders.  This makes it simple and easy.  Glad to be doing the work again!
Thank you! üòÜüòÑüòâüòáüòä
Too hard  to  keep  reminding  myself  all  day, this  app keeps  me  on  track. I  like  being  able  to  edit  the  reminders. And  the  tech  support  is  awesome!
Tremendous tool!

Just got the app and found that Lesson 335 (which I am currently on in the Workbook (latest FIP edition) is shown as Lesson 336 in the app!!  Please correct this!  Thanks for this wonderful service.  I don't know where it got messed up (which lesson that is) since I'm just starting today with the app.
replyContent: This has been corrected in version 2.6.2. Please clear cache (Settings/Application Manager) if you don't see the fix immediately after the update.

content: Overall, an effective app. I think I'm doing something wrong with the reminders, but it's pretty much exactly what I expected.
replyContent: Hello David - I'm happy to help you with what you think you are doing wrong.  Please feel free to contact me at cdesolutionsinc@gmail.com.

content: I knew needed some help remembering to practice my daily lessons, but until I started using this app and setting alerts, I had no idea how much I had been neglecting them!  This is a simple, but well designed and executed app, totally worth the low price, especially if you are (as I tend to be) easily distracted by the everyday work /life routines our ego uses to keep us away from The Course!  It's already helping me improve my awareness and 'right-thinking' hugely.  Thanks for a great learning/study aid!
I love the reminders. ....
I've been thinking about it for years. Now, I've finally ran into it. I love it.
The reminders are a real asset!  I had to follow the directions on how to set the reminders for my Android phone, but once I learned how to set them correctly I was good to go.
This is perfect. I can't think of anything else to say.
I love the daily reminders!

This is a new app for Android. I was so excited to find it at the beginning of the year. There have been a few glitches, but that is to be expected. The awesome thing is the responsiveness and passion of the developer. I recommend it if you love the ACIM Workbook but need reminders to stay engaged throughout the day.

I loaded this app on my galaxy note 4. And although it didnt initially work, the developer was eager, willing, responsive and immediately posted updates to resolve the issue. Apparently all android devices are a little different so don't hesitate to ask for help or an update for your device. It works perfectly now.
This app really helps keep me on track
